description: My place is close to Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, Atlantic Terminal, 2345 and S Trains, Franklin Avenue.. You’ll love my place because of It is a small and cozy space that is very accessible to most parts of the city.  If you're looking for a place that you can hop on a train and be nearly anywhere in the city quickly and then come back for a calm and quiet home base, then this is your place!. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and furry friends (pets).
name: One Bedroom off of Franklin Avenue in Brooklyn
